traits.name: Spider Climb
traits.description: The ettercap can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

traits.name: Web Sense
traits.description: While in contact with a web, the ettercap knows the exact location of any other creature in contact with the same web.

traits.name: Web Walker
traits.description: The ettercap ignores movement restrictions caused by webbing.

multiattack.description: The ettercap makes one Bite attack and one Claw attack.

actions.name: Bite
actions.description: Melee Attack Roll: +5, reach 5 ft. Hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) Piercing damage plus 4 (1d8) Poison damage. The target must succeed on a DC 11 Constitution saving throw or have the Poisoned condition for 1 minute. The target repeats the save at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

savingThrow.targets: the Poisoned creature at the end of each of its turns

actions.name: Claw
actions.description: Melee Attack Roll: +5, reach 5 ft. Hit: 8 (2d4 + 3) Slashing damage.

actions.name: Web
actions.description: Ranged Attack Roll: +5, range 30/60 ft. Hit: The target has the Restrained condition. As an action, a Restrained creature can make a DC 11 Strength check, escaping on a success. The effect also ends if the web is destroyed (AC 10; HP 5; Vulnerability to Fire damage; Immunity to Bludgeoning, Poison, and Psychic damage).

hit.additionalEffects: As an action, a Restrained creature can make a DC 11 Strength check, escaping on a success. The effect also ends if the web is destroyed (AC 10; HP 5; Vulnerability to Fire damage; Immunity to Bludgeoning, Poison, and Psychic damage).
